segments.text: Excuse me . Is this where I catch the bus for the zoo ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you can take the No . 36 bus from here , but then you have to walk about 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , if you go to the bus stop in the next block , you can take bus 301 which will let you right off in front of the zoo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe that's what I'll do . Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S1
